TopicTitle: We Have To Cook! (Walt and Jesse textures) [Kind-of-WIP. Not a mod in itself.]

Articles.Content:
I'm not really sure if this is the right place to put this, it's not an Add-On itself, but it's to do with an existing Add-On.

So I was messing around a bit with the textures from TextureReplacer and I thought I could give two Kerbals a head skin that would look at least a bit like Jesse and Walter from Breaking Bad. With the plan to stick them up in a space station.

(By the way, I checked the license before actually doing this, it's under the terms of the MIT Licence.)

I ended up with these:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Considering it's my first time working with textures, I don't think I've done too badly.
